leafs.name: Knowledge check 1
leafs.q: Question: Which of the following is not possible when a user is logged in as a standard user?
leafs.correct_option: Change the account password of another user

options.1: Change the background image on the desktop
options.2: Change the account password of another user
options.3: Change the account picture of own account
options.4: Play music from the hard disk

leafs.button_error: Watch video on setting a password for an account

leafs.name: Video 1
leafs.title: Creating a password for an account

leafs.name: Knowledge check 2
leafs.q: How can Abbas's dad allow Abbas to use his laptop and yet ensure his work is not lost?
leafs.correct: By creating a standard account for Abbas
leafs.button_error: Watch video on creating a new account

leafs.name: Knowledge check 3
leafs.q: How can Abbas's dad control what Abbad gets access to on Windows 7?

leafs.name: Challenge 1
leafs.question: Create a Standard Windows 7 account for Abbas and use the football picture (because Abbas is a big fan of football). Also set a password for Abbas's account.

leafs.name: Challenge 2
leafs.question: Set time limit for Abbas to use his dad's laptop as 5 AM to 8 AM from Monday to Wednesday.
